Interface BlackjackParticipantInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BlackjackDealer, BlackjackPlayer

    public interface BlackjackParticipantInterface
    BlackjackParticipantInterface defines the interface to be used by all Blackjack participants as well as common constants

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int ACE_HI_VALUE 
      static int BLACKJACK_WINNER 
      static int FACE_CARD_VALUE

    • Method Detail

      • updateHand

        void updateHand(java.util.ArrayList<BlackjackCard> newCards)
        updateHand() takes input newCards and adds the input newCards to the calling participant's hand. This is used for the initial deal to the players and the dealer so a blackjack is made.
        Parameters:
        newCards - the cards to be added to the hand

      • updateHand

        void updateHand(BlackjackCard newCard)
        updateHand() takes input newCard and adds the input newCard to the calling participant's hand. This is used for hits so checkForWinner() and checkForBust() is also made
        Parameters:
        newCard - the cards to be added to the hand

      • showHand

        java.lang.String showHand(int numberOfCardsToShow)
        showHand() returns a string representation of the participant's hand of an input number of cards to show. All cards are shown if input is 0 or input is greater than the length of 'hand'
        Parameters:
        numberOfCardsToShow - the number of cards to show
        Returns:
        a String representation of the player hand

      • getIsWinner

        boolean getIsWinner()
        getIsWinner() is a getter for this.isWinner
        Returns:
        this.isWinner for the calling BlackjackParticipant object

      • getIsBust

        boolean getIsBust()
        getIsBust() is a getter for this.bust
        Returns:

        getIsBlackjack() is a getter for this.blackjack
        Returns:
        this.blackjack for the calling BlackjackParticipant object

      • getCurrentScore

        int getCurrentScore()
        getCurrentScore() is a getter for this.currentScore
        Returns:
        this.currentScore for the calling BlackjackParticipant object

      • reset

        reset() resets all the attributes of a BlackjackParticipant
